description: Identifies whether the measurement occurs pre-treatment ("Pre") or post-treatment ("Post")
Name of treatment; Burn = prescribed burn; Thin = mechanical thining; Burn+Thin = both prescribed burn and mechancial thin; Control = control.
Plant functional type; includes cedar, fir, oak, and pine, and possibly others depending on the site
Average fraction (by basal area) of trees of the given PFT with DBH >= 15cm in treated units during the final year of measurement.
Standard error of average PFT fraction in the final year of measurement.
Average percent difference between treatment unit and control unit PFT fraction in the final year of measurement.
Standard error of average percent difference between treatment and control in the final year of measurement.

Average percent difference between treatment unit and control unit PFT fraction across all post-treatment measurements. This is a weighted average, in which differences during each measurement interval are weighted by the number of years in the measurement interval.
Standard error of average percent difference between treatment and control across all post-treatment measurements.
Range of years over which time-weighted average values are calculated
